activities.shortDescription: A catamaran cruise through Twofold Bay
activities.longDescription: Start with a brief walk along the pier en route to your sleek, twin-hulled catamaran. You'll take a leisurely cruise through Twofold Bay, named for its two distinct curves in the shoreline. Your guided tour will bring you through the history of Eden and Twofold Bay's role in the area's development, and along the way, you may even see humpback whales (if you're visiting during the right time of year).

Guided catamaran tour of Twofold Bay
activities.introduction: Board a twin-hulled catamaran for a cruise through Twofold Bay, one of the deepest natural harbors in the Southern Hemisphere.
instructionDetails: Wildlife sightings are likely but not guaranteed
Sailors prone to motion sickness should take precautions prior to this Shore Thing
This Shore Thing is wheelchair accessible for collapsible wheelchairs, as long as Sailors can navigate a few steps on their own
Approximately 15 minute walk to/from the pier
Approximately 2 hour boat cruise

activities.shortDescription: A photography tour of Eden by a pro photographer
activities.longDescription: Calling all aspiring photographers: this coastal walk will bring you to all the most scenic sights in Eden, while giving you a crash course in photography too. While being guided by a professional photographer, you'll visit clifftops, viewing platforms, and more, learning the history of the area and capturing stunning images. At the end, you'll walk away with a better understanding of photography -- even if it's just your phone camera.

activities.shortDescription: Discover the Sapphire Coast's scenic villages
activities.longDescription: All the highlights of the Sapphire Coast on one tour. Immerse yourself in the coast's local villages, starting with Merimbula, known for its beaches and seafood-- particularly the oysters. Then head to Pambula, defined by its peaceful lakes and idyllic river, where you'll have free time to explore and shop. Finish the day in Eden, the coast's home of whaling culture. Visit the Eden Killer Whale Museum, and then go watch for whales yourself.

activities.shortDescription: See kangaroos in the wild while enjoying some tea
activities.longDescription: Now's your chance to see the famous Australian kangaroo. Drive through the city to Eden Gardens Country Club, an area teeming with wildlife, including the Australian Kangaroo. Enjoy a chauffeured tour of the golf course in golf carts, and photograph the various animals that call it home. After your kangaroo safari, cap off a perfect morning with some tea and a mimosa.
